environment_variables.COMMAND: Command to be executed on the Slurm cluster
environment_variables.NAME: Job name
environment_variables.QUEUE: Slurm queue to submit the job to
environment_variables.JOBDIR: Optional directory to store the job script in
environment_variables.MEMORY: Amount of memory to request (in MB)
environment_variables.ACCOUNT: Account to use for the job
environment_variables.MODULES: Space separated list of required modules (e.g., 'python-gcc/2.7.5 qiime-gcc/1.8.0')
